channel.title: Change Gateway ip-Address
channel.description:
As soon as I change the IP address on the gateway from 10.152.152.10 to 10.152.152.11 in /etc/network/interfaces.d/30_non-qubes-whonix, the Internet on the workstation disappears (at the workstation, I set the new gateway values).
How can I change the default ip Gateway address?

item.title: Change Gateway ip-Address
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
tr777:

10.152.152.10 to 10.152.152.11

That’s the IP used by the workstation by default. So can’t use the same one.

Read full topic

item.title: Change Gateway ip-Address
item.dc:creator: tr777
item.description:
Thanks, I read it.
But, there is no answer how can I change the Whonix-gateway address (10.152.152.10).

Read full topic

item.title: Change Gateway ip-Address
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi tr777

Depends if your using virtualbox or KVM

https://whonix.org/wiki/Multiple_Whonix-Workstations#Multiple_Whonix-Gateways

Read full topic
